text: Ferdi Tyteca (born 27 December 1954) is a Belgian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Belgium Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Beveren
title: Ferdi Tyteca
